metadata.title: CVE-2024-0450 on Ubuntu 20.04 FIPS Compliant (focal) - medium
metadata.description: An issue was found in the CPython `zipfile` module affecting versions3.12.1, 3.11.7, 3.10.13, 3.9.18, and 3.8.18 and prior. The zipfile moduleis vulnerable to “quoted-overlap” zip-bombs which exploit the zip format tocreate a zip-bomb with a high compression ratio. The fixed versions ofCPython makes the zipfile module reject zip archives which overlap entriesin the archive.

criterions.comment: python2.7 package in focal is affected and may need fixing.
python3.8 package in focal is affected and may need fixing.
python3.9 package in focal is affected and may need fixing.
